meanings.definition: Of or from outside the earth or its atmosphere.
meanings.sent1: The scientists discovered an extraterrestrial object in space.
meanings.sent2: The movie depicted an extraterrestrial creature visiting Earth.
meanings.sent3: The children imagined an extraterrestrial picnic on Mars.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were so unique, they seemed almost extraterrestrial.
meanings.sent5: The glowing lights in the sky looked truly extraterrestrial.

meanings.definition: A being from beyond the earth or its atmosphere.
meanings.sent1: The astronauts claimed to have seen an extraterrestrial.
meanings.sent2: Many believe that extraterrestrials may exist in the universe.
meanings.sent3: The comic book featured an extraterrestrial character with superpowers.
meanings.sent4: The concept of meeting an extraterrestrial is both exciting and daunting.
meanings.sent5: The eyewitness described the encounter with the extraterrestrial in great detail.
